Posts.Content: Aug 1, 2015 09:40PM readytostartthejourney2015 wrote: Invasive Lobular diagnosed 10 days before my 39th birthday. I have a 8 and 12 year old. I was kicked out of the home I shared with my fianc√© and children for 9 years. He has turned his back on me and I am alone and scared. I meet with the Dr on the 11th. He wanted an mri with contrast and genetic tested before we came up with a plan. I also just started a new job, so I am worried about them letting me go as I have not told them yet. Because I don't have answers to give them yet.
Posts.Title: Recently Diagnosed....No treatment plan yet Nichcosmo Keyla
